Responsive Design Exercise

29 Nov 2013

Some time ago, I did a exercise for apply a job. This was the exam I made.

I think is a good idea for practice your front-end skills. So, if you have some time and want a challenge for sunday morning, you can try on your own to complete the task.

The exercise seem to be very simple (it doesn’t): create the markup of this design for mobiles, tablets and desktop

Check out my version. Maybe I’ll improve it soon. I don’t know if the approach was the correct, but it works in three different devices!.

I have a repo in Github with the code, check it out too.

I used a responsive tool created by Matt Kersley, was very usefull.
